select jmi.name name,dm.mobilephone mobilephone,di.amount investAmount,dpi.code productCode ,dpi.deadline deadline ,dpi.rate rate, DATE_FORMAT(jl.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') addTime ,jmi.address address,phone from js_member_info jmi left join `js_product_prize_log` jl on jl.uid = jmi.`uid` and jl.`type` = 0 left join `dr_product_invest` di on di.id= jl.`investId` left join `dr_product_info` dpi on dpi.id = di.`pid` left join dr_member dm on dm.uid = jmi.uid where 1 =1
and instr(dpi.code,#{productCode})>0
and instr(jmi.name,#{name})>0
and DATE_FORMAT(jl.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{orderFormStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(#{orderFormEnd},'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(jl.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by jl.addTime desc
limit #{offset},#{limit}
